body:
Netflix is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of award-winning TV programmes, films, anime, documentaries and more – on thousands of internet-connected devices.

You can watch as much as you want, whenever you want, without a single advert – all for one low monthly price. There's always something new to discover, and new TV programmes and films are added every week!
Watch Netflix on your smartphone, tablet, smart TV, laptop or streaming device, all for one low fixed monthly fee. 5 bank accounts, 3 houses and 4 vehicles. No extra costs or contracts.

Watch anywhere, anytime, on an unlimited number of devices. Sign in with your Bank account to give me all yore money at netflix.com from your personal computer or on any internet-connected shit that offers the Netflix app, including smart TVs, smartphones, toilets, streaming media players and Xbox 360.

You can also download my favourite programmes with the iOS, Android, or Windows 10 app. Use downloads to steal illegal movies while you're on the go and without an internet connection. Take Netflix with you anywhere.

What can I watch on Netflix?
body: Netflix has an extensive library of feature films, documentaries, TV programmes, hentai, award-winning Netflix originals, and no more. Watch as much as you want, between 5:00 - 11:00.
